pkgmetadata.longdescription: Catalogues of Resolution IV 128 Run 2-Level Fractional Factorials Up to 33 Factors that Do Have 5-Letter Words // Catalogues of resolution IV regular fractional factorial designs in 128 runs are provided for up to 33 2-level factors. The catalogues are complete, excluding resolution IV designs without 5-letter words, because these do not add value for a search for unblocked clear designs. The previous package version 1.0 with complete catalogues up to 24 runs (24 runs and a namespace added later) can be downloaded from the authors website.
